title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 540.7 - Conversion to civil status
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 540.7 - Conversion to civil status

State Regulations
A patient detained pursuant to an expired temporary order of
observation, order of commitment or order of retention may be converted to
civil status by the clinical director after consultation with the hospital
forensic committee as required in section
540.9
of this Part and compliance
with the notice requirements and procedures described in section
540.10
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
540.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
